messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] intro from joanne
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Joanne, It s Beth from the Y....I told you I lurked (which I normally do!!) but it was fun to see your intro.  Hope to talk in the pool next week if all
messages.messageBody:
Hi Joanne,
It's Beth from the Y....I told you I lurked (which I normally do!!) but it was fun to see your intro. Hope to talk in the pool next week if all babies cooperate!
Peace,
Beth

Joanne H <onskates@...> wrote:
uh, oh........another joanne

hi everyone. i just came on board. haven't been lurking too long. i
met ren and several others whose names i cannot remember at the
conference in peabody last spring.

i am almost 44 and birthed three: Joe is 9. Lydia is 7 and mary is
4.5. we are definitely a work in progress. unschooling is what we
are doing but have so much to keep learning and we are growing by
leaps and bounds.

not sure what else to say. we live in central mass. have a dog and
two hermit crabs...........

oh, i started writing last spring and still am. sort of poemy
things. i play guitar and sing. i am a visual artist......went to
art school in boston. am a music junky.........like a lot of people i
know.

nice to be here.

~joanne






Unschooling Mom to Frances (9), Will (7), Catherine (2), and Grace (6 months)
www.6uvus.blogspot.com

---------------------------------
Get your own web address for just $1.99/1st yr. We'll help. Yahoo! Small Business.

Hello Joanne...from another Joanne. :-)

~ Joanne ~

uh, oh........another joanne

hi everyone. i just came on board. haven't been lurking too long. i
met ren and several others whose names i cannot remember at the
conference in peabody last spring.

i am almost 44 and birthed three: Joe is 9. Lydia is 7 and mary is
4.5. we are definitely a work in progress. unschooling is what we
are doing but have so much to keep learning and we are growing by
leaps and bounds.

not sure what else to say. we live in central mass. have a dog and
two hermit crabs...........

oh, i started writing last spring and still am. sort of poemy
things. i play guitar and sing. i am a visual artist......went to
art school in boston. am a music junky.........like a lot of people i
know.

nice to be here.

~joanne
